definition: having the properties of an adhesive
details:
adjective
- having the properties of an adhesive
= example: having the properties of an adhesive
= synonyms: viscous, gluey, glutinous, gummy, mucilaginous, pasty
- covered with an adhesive material
- hard to deal with
= synonyms: awkward, embarrassing, unenviable
- hot or warm and humid
= synonyms: steamy, muggy
- moist as with undried perspiration and with clothing sticking to the body
= example: moist as with undried perspiration and with clothing sticking to the body
